title: black screen after champion slelect
body: after updated the new patch 0.0.1.147, black screen after champion select. and it will come out something like  unable to connect to server. can anyone help ? thks

replies.body: The black screen here is usually do to a network issue failing to connect to the game servers.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to fix this up!  Let me know if you have any questions!
btw its patch 6.19, i just tried it still black screen, and unable connect server
